page.title: 12FARFIELD MILL
page.content: { Farfield}is a company which manufactures clothes and textiles.{ { Pennine Tweed}is a small company which manufactures woollen textiles. Some of the material is made into jumpers which are sold in Canada, Australia and the U.S.A. There is one full-time and two part-time people employed here. The mill is open to visitors during the working day. {Lizard}is a small company manufacturing and distributing caving equipment. Lizard is a partnership of four people. A builder who has his work premises at the mill employs four full-time workers and his business is mainly local. Also on the same site is a joinery workshop and car repair garage/blacksmith.
